alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 29 at 8:50AM EDT until October 30 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible tonight. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Hartford CT, Tolland CT and Windham CT Counties. In Massachusetts, Northern Bristol MA and Western Plymouth MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Northwest Providence RI and Western Kent RI Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
